title: Fees
context: ยง636C-6 Fees. Any person filing a foreign judgment shall pay $100 to the clerk of the court. Fees for docketing, transcription, or other enforcement proceedings shall be as provided by law for judgments of the court of this State. [L 1983, c 31, pt of ยง1; am L 1998, c 128, ยง6]
